sections.heading: Short title. This Article may be cited as the Warehouse Safety Standards Task Force Act. As used in this Article, "this Act" refers to this Article.
sections.text: Short title. This Article may be cited as the Warehouse Safety Standards Task Force Act. As used in this Article, "this Act" refers to this Article.

sections.heading: The Warehouse Safety Standards Task Force.
sections.text: The Warehouse Safety Standards Task Force.

sections.heading: Reports. The Task Force must provide quarterly updates of its findings, discussions, and decisions to the Governor and the General Assembly
sections.text: The Task Force shall submit a final report of its recommendations to the Governor and the General Assembly no later than January 1, 2025.

sections.heading: Repeal. The Task Force is dissolved and this Act is repealed on January 1, 2026.
sections.text: Repeal. The Task Force is dissolved and this Act is repealed on January 1, 2026.

sections.heading: Severability. The provisions of this Act are severable under Section 1.31 of the Statute on Statutes.
sections.text: Severability. The provisions of this Act are severable under Section 1.31 of the Statute on Statutes.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law, except that Section 5-27 takes effect upon becoming law or on the date House Bill 4285 of the 102nd General Assembly takes effect, whichever is later and Section 5-36 takes effect July 1, 2024
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law, except that Section 5-27 takes effect upon becoming law or on the date House Bill 4285 of the 102nd General Assembly takes effect, whichever is later and Section 5-36 takes effect July 1, 2024.
